How often do you use your mobile banking: I use my mobile banking app almost every day to check my account balance, transfer funds and pay bills.

What features do you wish your current b: I would love to have more budgeting tools and spending insights integrated into my mobile banking app. It would also be great if the app had a feature that allowed me to easily split expenses with friends and family.

What are your financial goals in the sho: My short-term financial goals are to pay off my student loans and save up for a down payment on a house.

What are your financial goals in the lon: In the long-term, I want to continue advancing in my career and eventually retire comfortably. I also want to travel the world and have fun experiences with loved ones.
